snippet.title: Red Ronin - Announcement Trailer - #SBGames2020
snippet.description:
“What if you look a lightning-fast action game like Katana Zero or Hotline Miami and made it turn-based instead?”

Slash through enemies planning or going  with the flow in Red Ronin, a Tactical Turn-Based Dash n Slash game where you take control of Red in her bloodthirsty journey searching for revenge.

Wishslist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222570/Red_Ronin/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Thi_o_Oliveira
